publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2532 Mr Andy Kerr: Land Reform (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Land Reform (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace*, Ross Finnie*, Allan Wilson*, Peter Peacock*
